Title: The Gruffalo
Writer: Julia Donaldson (book), Axel Scheffler (book), Julia Donaldson (adaptation), Jakob Schuh (adaptation), Max Lang (adaptation)
Actors: Helena Bonham Carter, James Corden, Tom Wilkinson, John Hurt
Plot: A cunning mouse goes for a walk in the forest, and outwits a succession of predators.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.
